trans-unit.source: Target framework to publish for. The target framework has to be specified in the project file.
trans-unit.target: Framework di destinazione per cui eseguire la pubblicazione. Il framework di destinazione deve essere specificato nel file di progetto.

trans-unit.source: Output directory in which to place the published artifacts.
trans-unit.target: Directory di output in cui inserire gli artefatti pubblicati.

trans-unit.source: The path to a target manifest file that contains the list of packages to be excluded from the publish step.
trans-unit.target: The path to a target manifest file that contains the list of packages to be excluded from the publish step.

trans-unit.source: Publish the .NET Core runtime with your application so the runtime doesn't need to be installed on the target machine. Defaults to 'true' if a runtime identifier is specified.
trans-unit.target: Publish the .NET Core runtime with your application so the runtime doesn't need to be installed on the target machine. Defaults to 'true' if a runtime identifier is specified.
